name: Pigeon's Garden
description:
Do you know what a pigeon is ? Yes, I think so.

Have you already seen a pigeon farm ? I don't think so !

So this game is a game where you play a pigeon which farm roots vegetables like carots, beets, onions and potatoes ! BUT his farm is assault by OTHERS pigeons that want his vegetables. So the Pigeon's goal is to stop them and keep harvest his vegetables ! Packed into a chill and cartoon ambiance !

- - - CREDITS - - -

DEV : Hill Maya
DEV : VIC Benjamin
DEV : LICHERON Etienne
